txt.en: 'Yes, it is true! Crafty bugans have stolen all of my greatest achievements! These are all priceless relics, my friend, collected during many a great and daring expeditions! Where should we look first? My instinct as a great treasure-seeker is to seek out the places that certainly contain great treasures!' \n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Seek out Scaling Instances at your level.</rgb>
What is all this about a treasure stealing bugan?
